content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTTrack') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTTrack
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTTrack (
	[lms_track_id] int,
	[lms_track_opendt] datetime2(7),
	[lms_track_closedt] datetime2(7),
	[lms_track_loadid] int,
	[lms_track_userid] int,
	[lms_track_parcelid] int,
	[lms_track_tolocid] int,
	[lms_track_touserid] int,
	[lms_track_fromlocid] int,
	[lms_track_tracktypeid2] int,
	[lms_track_tracktypeid] int,
	[lms_track_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_track_toloadid] int,
	[lms_track_openstationid] int,
	[lms_track_closestationid] int,
	[lms_parcel_weight] float,
	[lms_parcel_chargeweight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_parcel_volweight] float,
	[lms_parcel_volumiserweight] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_flocation_id] int,
	[lms_flocation_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_tlocation_id] int,
	[lms_tlocation_description] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Semi Structured Data/OPS/ssttrack.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.F_SSTTrack
GO
